creator: L.W. van der Zalm
descriptionHtml:
Candid Open - The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

Candid Open is the platform for communication within and outside your organization. It consists of timelines, news feeds and chat features similar to your private social media. All to provide you with a pleasant and familiar way of communicating with colleagues and partners.

Share new knowledge, ideas and internal achievements quickly and easily with the rest of your team, department or organization. Enrich messages with pictures, videos and emoticons. Simply keep track of new posts from your colleagues, organization and partners.

Push-notifications will make you notice new coverage immediately. Especially convenient if you do not work behind a desk.

The benefits of Candid Open:

- Communicate wherever you are
- Information, documents and knowledge anytime, anywhere
- Share ideas, have discussions and share achievements
- No business email needed
- Learn from the knowledge and ideas within and outside your organization
- Save time, by reducing e-mail and quickly finding what you're looking for
- All shared messages are secured
- Important news will never be overlooked

Security & Management

Candid Open is 100% European and fully compliant with European privacy directives. A highly secure and climate-neutral European data center hosts our data. The data center uses the latest technologies in the field of security. However, should anything go wrong, there is a 24-hour standby engineer to solve any problems.

Feature list:

- Timeline
- Video
- Groups
- Messages
- News
- Events
- Locking and unlocking posts
- Who has read my post?
- Sharing files
- Integrations
- Notifications
descriptionShort: The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

title: Candid Open

container.value:
Candid Group B.V.
Johan van Hasseltweg 27
1021 KN Amsterdam

creator: L.W. van der Zalm
descriptionHtml:
Candid Open - The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

Candid Open is the platform for communication within and outside your organization. It consists of timelines, news feeds and chat features similar to your private social media. All to provide you with a pleasant and familiar way of communicating with colleagues and partners.

Share new knowledge, ideas and internal achievements quickly and easily with the rest of your team, department or organization. Enrich messages with pictures, videos and emoticons. Simply keep track of new posts from your colleagues, organization and partners.

Push-notifications will make you notice new coverage immediately. Especially convenient if you do not work behind a desk.

The benefits of Candid Open:

- Communicate wherever you are
- Information, documents and knowledge anytime, anywhere
- Share ideas, have discussions and share achievements
- No business email needed
- Learn from the knowledge and ideas within and outside your organization
- Save time, by reducing e-mail and quickly finding what you're looking for
- All shared messages are secured
- Important news will never be overlooked

Security & Management

Candid Open is 100% European and fully compliant with European privacy directives. A highly secure and climate-neutral European data center hosts our data. The data center uses the latest technologies in the field of security. However, should anything go wrong, there is a 24-hour standby engineer to solve any problems.

Feature list:

- Timeline
- Video
- Groups
- Messages
- News
- Events
- Locking and unlocking posts
- Who has read my post?
- Sharing files
- Integrations
- Notifications
descriptionShort: The social platform for your organization: for employees and external partners

Share new knowledge, ideas and internal achievements quickly and easily with the rest of your team, department or organization. Enrich messages with pictures, videos and emoticons. Simply keep track of new posts from your colleagues, organization and partners.

Push-notifications will make you notice new coverage immediately. Especially convenient if you do not work behind a desk.

The benefits of Candid Open:

- Communicate wherever you are
- Information, documents and knowledge anytime, anywhere
- Share ideas, have discussions and share achievements
- No business email needed
- Learn from the knowledge and ideas within and outside your organization
- Save time, by reducing e-mail and quickly finding what you're looking for
- All shared messages are secured
- Important news will never be overlooked

Security & Management

Candid Open is 100% European and fully compliant with European privacy directives. A highly secure and climate-neutral European data center hosts our data. The data center uses the latest technologies in the field of security. However, should anything go wrong, there is a 24-hour standby engineer to solve any problems.

Feature list:

- Timeline
- Video
- Groups
- Messages
- News
- Events
- Locking and unlocking posts
- Who has read my post?
- Sharing files
- Integrations
- Notifications
